page.title: 04Recreation in Epworth.
page.content: Epworth's main park is called The Thurlow.This caters for tennis and bowls and has a large grass area and equipment for children.Other play equipment is situated in the smaller Jubilee Gardens and sports pitches are located down Carrside. Adult recreation is catered for by the following organizations: The Women's Institute The Men's Society Adult Education Classes Caged Bird Society The Philatelic Society The Horticultural Society The Agricultural Society The Flower Arranging Club Clubs catering for the following sports: Football, Cricket, Netball, Bowls, Tennis, Badminton, Hockey and Basketball.
